title: Player made death threat against me
body: So an extremely toxic player made death threats against me after a game. I screen-capped it, opened a ticket and attached the screenshot. However, my concern is that I've heard of players like this getting nothing more than a slap on the wrist from friends who have experienced the same thing happen to them. Is the same going to happen here too?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Purebalance,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JEqwcObo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-20T23:29:28.831+0000)
>
> Given the way the punishment system works around here you can expect yourself to get a chat restriction in about a couple days.  They punish the victims around here and I'm sure the one who threatened your life reported you to be spiteful.

I agree on this crap. I've been banned/restricted so many times it's ridiculous. I've played on extreme tilt and took it out on someone after me getting flamed game after game after game. Riot punishes me. I get super toxic teams where they all buddy up and blame me for their dumb mistakes, I do nothing, and I get banned. Even have proof. Riot sucks again. Their system is broken, but all they do is send automated responses over and over.

> [{quoted}](name=Senorown,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JEqwcObo,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-19T10:06:42.396+0000)

> So an extremely toxic player made death threats against me after a game. I screen-capped it, opened a ticket and attached the screenshot. However, my concern is that I've heard of players like this getting nothing more than a slap on the wrist from friends who have experienced the same thing happen to them. Is the same going to happen here too?

At the same time, stop being such a pansy. How SERIOUSLY scared are you of a death threat on this game? And stop reporting people for calling you a jerk when you ARE one. Geez. Bunch of butthurt babies in this world anymore and I swear half of them play League. Grow up, grow some cojones, and stop being such a baby when you start crap with people. Do some breathing exercises or take a break, but for the love of God stop crying over every little thing.

Do some breathing exercises or take a break, but for the love of God stop crying over every little thing.

I think you've completely missed the point of what I was getting at in my original post but I'll break it down for you.
-Toxic dude runs his mouth.
-Screen-cap and report.
-Community doesn't need that kind of toxicity in it.
-If I was as "scared" of his threat as you claim don't you think I would've contacted the cops and blown it entirely out of proportion?

I appreciate the effort you went through to give your thoughts on the subject but for the love of God stop assuming things and over-analyzing every little detail. Oh and kudos for assuming I antagonized the guy that made the threat. 10/10 Detective work.

Given the way the punishment system works around here you can expect yourself to get a chat restriction in about a couple days.  They punish the victims around here and I'm sure the one who threatened your life reported you to be spiteful.

I'm not entirely sure on riots stance on death threats, but I would believe they would take it seriously, if you have a screenshot of it, I would wait for there response on it, hopefully something other then a wrist slap would happen.

Sorry to inform you of this hut riot can some times just not care about the mater. I have had someone somehow find out my name and the name of my device I was using during the game shortly after his death threats. I had visual prof of the logs and everything yet after riot responded and told me they would handle the situation I noticed his history is still continuing on even now. So either riot just does not care or they are so messed up internally that they cant handle a simple issue as such.
